title: China Modern Taizhou Escape with Tranquil Day Spa
description: Enjoy a slice of glitz and glamour from the moment you step foot in the dazzling lobby at Crowne Plaza Taizhou, an IHG Hotel. A visit to the onsite spa is a must: treat your mind, body and soul to relaxation with hydrotherapy, a soothing massage or a steamy sauna session. Enjoy a spot of leisure time with a splash in the outdoor swimming pool, and when hunger strikes, the excellent restaurant serves up a mouthwatering array of Chinese specialties that you'd find across the country.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Taizhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.999 Shuangshui Road, Luqiao District, Taizhou, Zhejiang 318050, China
